title: Photodex ProShow Gold 8.0.3648 Incl Activator / Portable
description:
Photodex ProShow Gold 8.0.3648 + Portable

Create instant shows on your desktop with unlimited photos, videos and music. Customize easily. Share online or on TV. Build slideshows fast with the automatic wizard. Add photos, videos + text. Enhance with built-in FX. Built-in music library and editing tools. Share finished videos on TV, online and more.

Combine photos, videos + music.
Create slideshows with as many photos, videos and songs as you want. Add from your computer or import fromFlickr, Picasa, Instagram and more. Add multiple photos to one slide for fun, multi-layered effects. ProShow makes working with video just as easy as using photos. Finally something to do with all those clips from your camera or cellphone.

Fast and easy to use
Use the wizard to create instant shows. Just pick a theme and the wizard automatically creates a great-looking slideshow for you, timed perfectly to your music. Ready to watch or fine-tune in just moments. Browse hundreds of royalty-free tracks in the built-in music library to quickly find the perfect soundtrack for your show. When you're ready to take a little more control, ProShow makes it easy to work with your show. You can get started with just a few clicks, with more advanced features always within reach.

Animate with fun effects
Add cool effects and animations to your photos and videos with ProShow's slide styles and transitions. Simulate page turns, create multi-photo montages and more. Just click to preview an effect and apply to any slide in your show. You'll get fun and creative effects in an instant! Feeling creative? You can also customize motion effects for your photos and videos. Zoom into a point of interest, add some 3D, pan across a panoramic image or rotate any photo.

Edit photos and videos in a flash
ProShow offers a sea of built-in editing tools. Fix flaws on the spot with crop, auto-correct and red-eye removal tools. Transform a color photo or video into dramatic black and white. You can even trim video clips!

Styles & transitions
Over 650 built-in effects for your photos and videos.

Pan, zoom, 3D, rotate
Just click and drag to create your own motion effects.

Timing control
Set times for slides and effects. Trim video + song length.

Instant show creation
Let ProShow do all the work with the show wizard.

Image editing
Crop, remove red-eye, color correct and more.

Music library
300+ royalty free tracks for personal & commercial shows.

Custom captions
Add titles to any slide in your show. Choose your own font, color and size. Use cool effects to bring captions to life, simulate rolling credits, add fade-ins and outs, and create unique intro captions. Go beyond simple fly-in/ fly-out effects with custom caption motion effects.

Music and voiceovers
ProShow Gold comes stocked with a library of royalty-free music, instantly available to use in your shows. 280+ songs and 25 sound FX hand-picked to fit every occasion and licensed for personal and commercial use. Use built-in audio controls to crop songs, crossfade multiple tracks, record voiceovers and set custom fades. Record and add voiceovers to narrate your shows.

Share on any screen
Sharing shows is easy, with over 40 popular formats for watching on TV, online, and devices. Easily post shows onand YouTube. Burn directly to DVD, Blu-ray, AVCHD and CD. Send slideshows to your iOS device with the free ProShow Remote app. Add a personal touch with Hollywood-style movie menus.

Minimum Requirements:
- Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
- 1024 x 768 display
- 1GHz+ processor or better
- 2GB system memory
- Accelerated 3D graphics â€“ 64MB ram
- DirectX 8.0 or better
- DVD+R/RW/-R/RW writer
- 70 MB hard drive space

What's New in ProShow Gold 8.0 
http://www.photodex.com/proshow/gold#new
